name: Thousand Foot Krutch
description:
'''Thousand Foot Krutch''' (often abbreviated '''TFK''') is a Canadian Christian [[ Rock music|rock]] band formed in [[Peterborough, Ontario]], in 1995. The band has released ten studio albums, two live albums, and three remix albums. The core members consist of founding member [[Trevor McNevan]] (vocals, guitar), Steve Augustine (drums), and Joel Bruyere (bass, backing vocals).

Since forming, Thousand Foot Krutch has sold over 1.1 million albums and reached No. 1 on the ''Billboard'' Hard Rock Albums Chart twice.
